title: Real-time currency exchange rate fetching success
description: Verify that currency exchange rates are fetched successfully every 5 minutes and prices update accordingly.

steps.description: Load the Olive Discount Hub homepage with default locale.
Check that currency exchange rates are fetched on initial load.
Ensure product prices display the converted values using the fetched exchange rates.
Wait for 5 minutes.
Verify that a new exchange rate fetch occurs exactly once after 5 minutes.
Confirm product prices update dynamically according to the new exchange rates.

title: Currency exchange rate fetching failure fallback UI
description: Ensure the application displays fallback or error UI gracefully when currency exchange rate fetching fails.

steps.description: Simulate failure in fetching currency exchange rates (e.g., API down or network error).
Load the Olive Discount Hub homepage.
Check that a fallback or loading UI is displayed in place of currency data.
Verify that the UI does not crash or freeze and remains responsive.
Ensure product prices either display last known rates or appropriate placeholder.

title: Language switcher updates locale and currency synchronously
description: Verify that selecting a different language in the header updates the locale in the URL and synchronously changes the currency symbols and text content.

steps.description: Load the Olive Discount Hub homepage with default locale.
Click the language switcher in the header and select a different supported language.
Confirm the URL updates to reflect the selected locale.
Check that all textual content on the page updates instantly to the selected language without page reload.
Verify the currency symbols and product prices update to the correct currency for the selected locale.

title: No missing translation keys across all locales
description: Validate that all 10 supported locale message files contain translations for all UI text keys with no missing entries.

steps.description: Load all locale message files for the 10 supported languages.
Check that every UI text key present in the default locale is also present in all other locale files.
Verify that no translation keys are empty or null.

title: Responsive product grid layout adjusts columns by viewport size
description: Ensure product grid layout adapts to the correct number of columns based on device viewport: 1 column for mobile, 2 for small tablets, 3-4 for desktops.

steps.description: Open the product page on a mobile viewport (small screen).
Verify the product grid displays with exactly 1 column.
Resize the viewport to a tablet size.
Confirm the product grid changes to 2 columns.
Resize the viewport to desktop sizes.
Verify the product grid displays 3 to 4 columns depending on desktop viewport width.

title: Product card UI handles long product titles with text truncation
description: Verify that product cards correctly truncate long product titles and prevent overflow to maintain consistent layout.

steps.description: Load product cards with extremely long product titles.
Check that long titles are truncated with ellipsis or other truncation methods as designed.
Confirm product card layout remains consistent and no overflow or wrap-around breaking UI occurs.

title: Product price display adapts to long price formats without layout breakage
description: Validate that product price display adjusts properly for long or complex formatted prices and does not break the product card layout.

steps.description: Simulate product prices with long decimal values or large numbers caused by currency conversion.
Verify price text displays fully or uses truncation or wrapping without overlapping adjacent UI elements.
Confirm product cards retain alignment and consistent sizing.

title: Currency exchange rate polling should avoid duplicate requests and memory leaks
description: Ensure the currency rate fetching logic polls exactly once every 5 minutes without overlap or duplicate polling and does not introduce memory leaks over extended usage.

steps.description: Start the application and monitor network requests over a period of 15+ minutes.
Verify only one fetch request is sent every 5 minutes.
Ensure no multiple or overlapping currency fetch requests occur simultaneously.
Use profiling to monitor for memory leaks related to currency polling timers or subscriptions.
Confirm no increasing memory consumption or event listener buildup is detected.

title: Language and currency switcher updates URL and dynamically updates UI instantly
description: Verify that using the language and currency switcher in the header updates the URL locale param and immediately updates UI texts and pricing without requiring page reload.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage with default locale and currency.
Interact with the language and currency switcher to select a different locale.
Confirm the locale parameter in the URL changes accordingly.
Verify all textual UI elements update instantly to the selected language.
Check product prices update to show the correct currency symbol and converted prices dynamically.
